text.0: these heaven and earth bestow prosperity on all sustainers of the region holy ones and wise.
text.1: two bowls of noble kind between these goddesses the god the fulgent sun travels by fixed decree.
text.2: widelycapacious pair mighty that never fail the father and the mother keep all creatures safe.
text.3: the two worldhalves the spirited the beautiful because the father hath clothed them in goodly forms.
text.4: son of these parents he the priest with power to cleanse sage sanctifies the worlds with his surpassing power.
text.5: thereto for his bright milk he milked through all the days the partycoloured cow and the prolific bull.
text.6: among the skilful gods most skilled is he who made the two worldhalves which bring prosperity to all.
text.7: who with great wisdom measured both the regions out and stablished them with pillars that shall neer decay.
text.8: extolled in song o heaven and earth bestow on us ye mighty pair great glory and high lordly sway.
text.9: whereby we may extend ourselves ever over the folk and send us strength that shall deserve the praise of men.
